akas: Tequila cu suflet de femeie Romania
akas from release info: Tequila cu suflet de femeie Romania

1.title: Destilando amor
1.plot: Teresa Hernández García "Gaviota" and her mother Clara arrive as every year to harvest agave, while Amador the owner of the farm is in poor health and his wife and children ask him to return to the city but he refuses and go dead.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Gaviota and Rodrigo take some tequilas together, on their return, Rodrigo is impressed with their beauty and innocence and they kiss.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Gaviota and Rodrigo make love in the shade of a tree. They swear eternal love and he promises to return in a year to marry her.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The months go by and Gaviota still can not forget Rodrigo as he loves him even more every day, and yet the work at the hacienda ends and they have to move but Gaviota will not stop looking for Rodrigo when he returns from his trip.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Teresa is deceived by the photographer, who promised her a successful career as a model in Europe; When she arrives there, she realizes that they have cheated on her and they want to prostitute her.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Gaviota is thrilled to find Rodrigo but unfortunately suffers a terrible accident, however, Felipe Rodrigo's father has died just like his mother.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Gaviota awakes from his terrible accident where he unfortunately loses the son he was expecting from Rodrigo, while Isadora knows Rodrigo and does not hesitate to seduce him and make him fall in love.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Rodrigo finds out that Seagull abroad was in a dating house working, angry goes in search of Isadora and asks him to get married.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Rodrigo is determined to marry Isadora since he does not believe that Gaviota can return some day, but Gaviota, wanting to return, is stopped at the airport and can not get there.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: When he arrives at the hacienda, Román tells him that his mother has disappeared and does not know what to do, but he also finds out that Rodrigo got married and gets very sad.

11.title: The Truth
11.plot: Aaron tells his relatives that his wife is expecting a baby which makes everyone very happy, while Gaviota and Rodrigo are getting closer and closer without even knowing it.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Gaviota gets sad because they did not accept her in the Montalvo corporate, but Rodrigo introduces himself and Gaviota manages to listen to him and will not leave if he does not manage to talk to Aaron.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Gaviota things are not going well now is dismissed from his job at the hotel and all for looking for another job in the corporate, which causes Clarita to find out only be disappointed over Gaviota.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Gaviota finds her mother and tells her how she lost her baby, so Clara tells her to tell everything to Rodrigo but Gaviota refuses, while Isadora starts getting annoyed with Rodrigo since they have not yet had a honeymoon .

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Rodrigo talks to the Seagull and tells him why he married Isadora and confesses that he is still in love with her but the Seagull does not believe him and does not accept his help or his love.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Gaviota and his mother leave the hacienda which makes Isadora happy but Rodrigo sad and desperate, at the same time Rodrigo confesses to Isadora that he loves Gaviota the only one he loves and asks for a divorce.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Isadora blackmails Rodrigo by saying that she got hurt by trying to go after him, so she stays with him for a few days at the hacienda, while Gaviota can not forget him.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Aaron arrives with his lover at the hotel where the Seagull works, she sees him hiding and does not know whether to tell her mother, while Rodrigo apologizes to Isadora and tells him that Gaviota is not expecting a baby from him.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Isadora thinks that Rodrigo will no longer look for the Seagull, but not everything goes as expected since he hears that Rodrigo will ask for a divorce.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Gaviota learns that the corporate Montalvo is hiring people and does not hesitate to go to interviews for what changes his look, but does not imagine that Rodrigo works in that company.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Ilario feels very bad for having kissed Isadora since he thinks that he betrayed Rodrigo, while Rodrigo proposes Isadora to go to the city to be distracted for a while, but she refuses as he thinks he would look for the Seagull.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Gaviota finally gets the job in the corporate Montalvo with the name of Mariana, but when Minerva finds out she does not hesitate to think that she is the new lover of Aaron, while Rodrigo goes in search of Seagull.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Isadora will not rest until Rodrigo manages to forget the Seagull so he makes a very special dinner to sleep with her, while Mariana is blamed for having disappeared the computer monitor.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Minerva almost discovers Aarón with her lover but Mariana manages to warn him, but Genoveva calls him and tells him everything so that Aaron knows that he fired her and in his place Mariana remains.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Rodrigo is desperate because he does not know where and how to find Gaviota, which causes Isadora to tell Sofía and Minerva and plan how to get rid of her.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Isadora blackmails Sofía and tells him that she feels defeated and that she is more than determined to divorce Rodrigo but Sofía asks her to think about it and promises to help her, but wanting to talk to Rodrigo only makes him get upset with her.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Mariana is changed to a new larger department and with the purpose of changing her life, while Isadora will have to devise a new plan since Sofía can not get Rodrigo to look for her.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Doña Pilar talks to Rodrigo and asks him to think things through and love Isadora, but he explains that he still loves Gaviota, while Mariana learns that Rodrigo is happy with his wife.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Aaron fights with his father because he does not agree with him new tequila, while Mariana presents the product to him that he loves and congratulates her and Aaron.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Aarón invites Mariana to dinner to celebrate the success they have had with the presentations of their product, but when they take her home, Aarón tries to kiss her, which puts Mariana in a bad mood and wants to give up working with him.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Minerva has a very strong discussion with Aaron, because he claims that because he re-hired Mariana, but Aaron tries to explain how things went, however, Minerva does not want to understand and in desperation falls down the stairs.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Minerva feels devastated because she lost the baby she was so happy to expect, but Aaron and Fedra help her to feel better, while Mariana talks to Rodrigo on the phone to clear up business.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Isadora falls into the seduction networks of Aaron, while Doña Pilar demands Rodrigo to appear at the congress. Mariana refuses to go to the Montalvo estate because she is afraid to meet Rodrigo.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Rodrigo discovers that Mariana is Gaviota and decides to stay in command of the company to work alongside her.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Rodrigo wants to know if Gaviota still loves him, when he asks her, she replies that he feels absolutely nothing for him anymore.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Rodrigo is jealous and wants to know how Gaviota climbed so quickly in the company. Every day he leaves a flower arrangement in his office.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Mariana prepares for the presentation cocktail but she knows that she will meet Rodrigo, so her mother asks her to forgive him since she knows she still loves him.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Rodrigo helps Mariana with her car since it broke down, and she confesses that she only agreed to enter the corporate for her, Mariana tries to become strong, but she can not because she still loves him.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Minerva can not allow Isadora and Rodrigo to have a child before her and fears that Aaron will leave her, while Rodrigo quarrels with his workers and worries Mariana and Dona Pilar, therefore renouncing the corporate.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Aaron's mother warns him that now that Isadora is artificially pregnant his plans to keep the hacienda will go down. What worries Aaron, while Mariana does not stop thinking about Rodrigo now that he knows he will not leave.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Mariana feels confused because Isadora tells him that she loves Rodrigo and that they want to have a child, therefore, Mariana asks Rodrigo to stay away and not bother her anymore, while Rodrigo when arriving at his house is questioned by Isadora.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Mr. Trejo claims Rodrigo for the negotiations since the tequila he bought has not been delivered to him. Mariana defends Rodrigo and explains to Mr. Trejo that this is Aaron's fault.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Rodrigo sees Mariana hugging another man and thinks they are dating, while Minerva returned to inform Aaron that she is completely healthy and is on treatment to get pregnant.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Rodrigo tells Mariana that she has decided to have a child with Isadora since she has not known how to value it. What makes Mariana sad and disappointed, but Rodrigo can not control himself and cries desperately in a park.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Aaron tells Minerva that he has to have a son before Isadora, otherwise all his plans will not be made. But she asks for time, while Rodrigo informs Mariana that James will work with her.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Minerva takes Isadora to the presentation of tequila to show her that Rodrigo cheats on her with Mariana, but unfortunately Rodrigo is no longer there. The next day Rodrigo meets Mariana and both confess their love.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Rodrigo and Gaviota work together in the office and he prepares a romantic dinner, Isadora finds them embraced.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Doña Pilar talks with Rodrigo and her love for Mariana, she knows that her love is clean, pure and also faithful, but she asks Isadora to understand that she loves him and knows that with the arrival of the baby everything will change.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Christmas dinner arrives and everyone is very happy, but Rodrigo shows up at Mariana's house to give him his gift, while the Montalvo family goes through a very bad time with the presence of Aaron's mistress.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Rodrigo says goodbye to his family to meet Mariana, while Isadora communicates with Minerva to find out where Rodrigo is, since he still does not arrive home for Christmas Eve.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Rodrigo decides to leave his house because he confesses to Isadora that he will never be able to love her, which destroys Isadora completely, while Mariana tells her friend that she loves Rodrigo more every day.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Don Bembenuto wants to help Mariana to manage to forget Rodrigo but without knowing it, she places the same psychologist who treats Rodrigo.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Isadora's father talks to her and asks her to fix things with Rodrigo. But she refuses and wants to divorce as soon as possible, while the Seagull returns and confesses to Rodrigo her love.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Mariana and Rodrigo meet in Manzanillo, Rodrigo tells him how his life was with Isadora, they swear love in front of the sea and they give themselves completely.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Rodrigo escapes with Mariana to an island and that is where Rodrigo tells him never to return with Isadora that he wants his wife to be her forever, but Mariana tells him that first they will have to fix the situation with his family.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Isadora returns from her trip and calls Rodrigo to the office but learns that she has not arrived in Mexico, while Mariana and Rodrigo say goodbye with a kiss and an oath of love.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Rodrigo arrives on time to his house to spend the new year which makes his family very happy, but before going to his house he comes to Mariana's apartment to give him his hug and wish him the best now that they will be more together and in love.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: The relationship between Mariana and Rodrigo is improving and they can not help but show their love for each other but Rodrigo's secretary almost finds them kissing what makes Mariana nervous because she is afraid that she will tell Isadora.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Mariana and Rodrigo are ready to move in together; When everything is about to materialize Isadora and Minerva discover that the Seagull works for the corporate.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Minerva and Isadora already know that the Gaviota is Mariana Franco so they talk to Aaron to inform him that now more than ever he has to run it from the corporate because they fear he runs away with Rodrigo.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Aarón finds out that Rodrigo asked for the liquidation of Mariana so he sends her to call to confront her and to tell her that everyone already knows what the Seagull is and seeing the situation to Mariana, she has no choice but to tell the whole truth.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Aaron lies to Rodrigo telling him that he had love affairs and unseemly propositions with Mariana which makes Rodrigo very ill, however, Rodrigo when looking for her and not finding her believes in what his cousin told him.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Mariana gets very bad because she thinks that Rodrigo cheated on her again and regrets everything, while Francisco did not rest until he managed to make Sofía fall in love.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Things are not going well for Minerva because she fears that if Isadora has a baby she can lose Aaron, while Mariana gets very bad because of all the problems she now has.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Rodrigo does not stop thinking that Mariana had something to do with her cousin, while she gets very badly what worries Clarita enough.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Rodrigo calls James a traitor because he was the only one who knew that Mariana was actually the Seagull and never told him that in addition to running him from his position in the distiller.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Isadora demands half of the Montalvo fortune since she has endured Rodrigo in everything, but the lawyer tells her that in order for her to be given that and more, she will have to have a son of Rodrigo.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Clarita see that her daughter does not get a good job tells her that she should be a singer what makes them look for a label to record her album, while Isadora's mother finds her daughter kissing Francisco.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Mariana needs to get a job but for this she needs a letter of recommendation from her previous job which makes Mariana in a big dilemma, while Isadora finds out she is pregnant.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: Isadora confesses to Sofia that she is expecting a son of Rodrigo, however she asks Paulino to say that the son she is waiting for is Rodrigo since she knows it is not.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: Sofia shows up at the hacienda to inform Rodrigo that Isadora will have a son of his, which causes her to be surprised and not know what to do, while Daniela will not stop investigating Mariana's case.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Minerva gets a divorce claim which makes her sad and furious because she does not understand why. Aaron shows up and wants to fix things but Minerva refuses and runs him from the house.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Thanks to the intrigues of Aaron against Seagull; Rodrigo asks Isadora for a second chance now that he knows they will have a child.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Daniela confronts Aaron and claims in front of everyone that he did not give a penny to Mariana when he resigned, however Fedra defends his son by heart and sword but his father does not believe anything while Aaron only says he did it he good.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Isadora feels very happy because things with Rodrigo are improving and even Rodrigo proposes to help her to get her father out of prison, while Acacia accidentally kills her uncle.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Sofia feels very happy with the relationship she now has with Francisco but what she does not imagine is that he sees her face as she seeks and wants to conquer Mariana, while Minerva finds her husband with her lover.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Minerva can not control her jealousy and wants to take revenge on Aaron by publishing the deception she did to him in all the newspapers, while Rodrigo is more than willing to take his father-in-law out of jail.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: Francisco is reunited with Isadora and can not help but feel something, while Rodrigo tells Isadora that he wants to talk to him to see how his son is doing, what makes her nervous and fears that she is not his son.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Gaviota's house comes to court to seize what makes Gaviota and Clarita sad and desperate, while Rodrigo asks Isadora's doctor to give her a checkup to see if she can travel now that she is pregnant.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: James and Acacia get married, which makes everyone very happy except for his uncle, while Mariana, wanting to sell her encyclopedias in the market, is booed by the owner.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Rodrigo decides to return to the corporate only because his uncle asked him to do so, while Gaviota loses his job and now he does not know what to do or explain to Clarita.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Daniela tells Rodrigo what she talked with Mariana and the lawyer what makes Rodrigo think a lot, while Isadora asks Francisco to decide between her or Sofia because he does not intend to share it anymore.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Mariana starts working with him, which makes her happy because not only did she get a job but a letter of recommendation from Rodrigo Montalvo, which causes her to think about him again.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Francisco asks Sofía to be a wife and she accepts, but when she tells her grandmother she gets very sad because she says it's too soon, but Francisco tells her that they have to go to Japan because she has a very good proposal of job.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Rodrigo asks Mariana to talk but they start fighting in the street, while Sofia tells Daniela that she is going to Japan so that she does not have to see her and despise her more.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: Pamela's father threatens Aaron that if he does not meet his daughter he will be seen with him, while Isadora asks Francisco to wait for her and not marry Sofia, since she will not take long to divorce Rodrigo.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: Rodrigo confronts the people who hurt Mariana, while Clarita, in telling Mariana, can not help but be surprised because she even asked about her, which makes Seagull too emotional.

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: Things are getting better for Mariana since now she is doing better than ever in her work, while Francisco has everything planned so that Doña Pilar believes that her parents are from a very good family.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: Rodrigo thinks that with the arrival of his son he will be able to completely forget the Seagull, but when visiting the agave's he can not help remembering it and hallucinating it.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: Mr. James finds Acacia crying in the corral but when asked why she confesses that he killed his uncle accidentally. Pamela suspects that Aaron does not really want her so she devises a plan to keep him.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: Pamela is worried that Aaron asks him to give him his passport or he loses it forever, but Fedra manages to solve things, while Rodrigo is reunited with the Seagull.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Clarita talks to the Seagull and tells her that she is more than sure that the son Isadora is waiting for is not from Rodrigo, while everyone is preparing Sofia's wedding but Rodrigo claims to his family that they were responsible for him not Be Happy.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Aaron asks Sofía not to leave because he still loves her and he no longer thinks or wants to marry Pamela. Sofia doubts it but seeing him getting on his knees gives him a second chance.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: Rodrigo bets the bet on the Seagull and invites her to eat so she can talk and explain everything but the Seagull asks her to respect her and keep her distance, while in the distance Gaviota will see the photographer who has long deceived her to prostitute her.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: Minerva spends a night of passion with Aaron, but they are interrupted by a call from Isadora telling Minerva that she has to get Mariana out of the corporate as soon as possible.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Minerva has Aaron's cell phone and discovers that she still talks to Pamela and that she was ready to go with her, while the Montalvo family organizes a meeting to get Mariana out of the corporate and thus leave her without work and away from Rodrigo.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Rodrigo arrives at the hotel where Mariana would be staying, but when she asks for it, she finds out that she is not there and returns to Mexico. Mariana when she arrives at the corporate office, they give her her resignation, which makes her furious and sad because she feels an injustice.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Mariana tells Clarita that they have to go live in Guadalajara because they offered her a job and a better job there, but Mariana can not help but be sad like Rodrigo.

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: Mariana is upset with Alonso since he has her working late into the night as well as complaining that he does not treat his workers well, while Rodrigo's business grows.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Isadora, Minerva and Sofia plan how to separate Mariana from Rodrigo now that she was not fired from the corporate, but Mariana and Rodrigo talk on the phone to feel close.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Mariana is more than determined to go to Guadalajara but they inform her that if she likes, she can stay and get on the job as long as she complies with the pact of not approaching Rodrigo, which makes Mariana accept completely.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Minerva tells Aaron that very soon she could give him the news that she is pregnant but Aaron tells her that it has to be a boy, while Isadora finds out that Mariana was not run by the company and fears that he will still see her.

103.title: Episode #1.103
103.plot: Isadora appears with Mariana and asks him to respect her marriage or be in great trouble, Mariana accepts and fights with Rodrigo as he can not believe in him again, while Rodrigo asks him why.

104.title: Episode #1.104
104.plot: Mariana learns that Pancho is the son of Doña Jose and that she will meet him one day to see him and congratulate him, while Isadora gets in a good mood knowing that Mariana is not seeing Rodrigo.

105.title: Episode #1.105
105.plot: Mariana confesses that she will always love Rodrigo and they stop seeing in a restaurant but Isadora meets Mariana and does not hesitate to claim her, however she is about to give birth so Mariana will help her even if she is her enemy.

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot: Mariana talks with Rodrigo about how it was that she arrived with Isadora to the hospital, however, she asks for what she wants and takes great care of her son.

107.title: Episode #1.107
107.plot: Isadora tells Minerva, and Sofia how it was that Mariana helped her what surprises them, while Francisco proposes to Isadora that they both separate from their partners and keep a good part of the money.

108.title: Episode #1.108
108.plot: Isadora fights with Rodrigo and demands that he not threaten him with the child since he is also his son. However, Aaron will not rest until he demonstrates that Rodrigo's son is not a Montalvo and with the help of his mother he will achieve it.

109.title: Episode #1.109
109.plot: The DNA tests are given to Aaron and he discovers that the son of Isadora is not Rodrigo's, let alone a Montalvo.

110.title: Episode #1.110
110.plot: Isadora is annoyed with Rodrigo and is more than determined to divorce him what surprises him, since she only expects her father to pay his debt because he can not stand his deceptions anymore with Mariana, however he blackmails him with the baby.

111.title: Episode #1.111
111.plot: Sofia talks to Isadora De Francisco and their relationship as husbands, but Isidro, seeing that they are not doing well, tells Sofía that if she has not thought about her husband cheating on her, which causes Sofía to begin to doubt.

112.title: Episode #1.112
112.plot: Rodrigo's sister tells him that Alonso is getting closer to Mariana, Rodrigo can not hide his jealousy because he talks to Mariana and asks her to plan a future together since he does not stop thinking about her.

113.title: Episode #1.113
113.plot: Mariana goes out to dinner with Alonso and her Clarita, but Rodrigo spies on them and thinks that he does not love him anymore when he sees them together, but he shows up at the restaurant and he demands he leave it there.

114.title: Episode #1.114
114.plot: Rodrigo and Mariana end in the delegation fighting for him love and betrayals that they have each other, while Alonso confesses that he is completely in love with Mariana.

115.title: Episode #1.115
115.plot: Rodrigo demands that Isadora's father repay his debt as soon as possible, but Mariana quits her job which surprises Roberto and makes Alfredo very sad.

116.title: Episode #1.116
116.plot: Rodrigo asks Mariana not to give up her job, which causes Mariana to begin to doubt that he really follows his word to separate from Isadora, while Francisco begins to have shady deals.

117.title: Episode #1.117
117.plot: Roberto talks to Doña Pilar and tells him that his nieces are the ones who are sabotaging Mariana's work, which makes Doña Pilar get upset and gather everyone in her house to clarify this situation.

118.title: Episode #1.118
118.plot: The day of the meeting with the grandmother arrives and she tells her nephews how horrified she is with the attitude of the family, while Sofía begins to confirm that Francisco cheats on her what makes Isadora nervous.

119.title: Episode #1.119
119.plot: Isadora, Fedra, Sofía and Minerva organize a meeting to be able to destroy the Seagull once and for all since they did not like anything that the grandmother would defend her.

120.title: Episode #1.120
120.plot: Daniela begins to investigate if Rodrigo's son is his because he does not hesitate to think that Isadora cheated him, while Gaviota talks to Doña Pilar about him because he did not invite the Montalvo to the tequila meeting.

121.title: Episode #1.121
121.plot: Sofia tells Francisco that Daniela is investigating if Ricky is the son of Rodrigo, which makes Francisco nervous and fearful that Ricky is his son.

122.title: Episode #1.122
122.plot: Rodrigo is confronted with Alonso all for having yelled at Mariana, while Sofía, Minerva, Fedra and Isadora meet to take since they were not invited to the event.

123.title: Episode #1.123
123.plot: Rodrigo can not help feeling jealous of Alonso since he and Mariana will go to Manzanillo to do business with the new tequila.

124.title: Episode #1.124
124.plot: Aaron talks to Pamela and tells him that unfortunately he no longer loves her but that they can later be seen as good friends, while Rodrigo fights with Sofia because she fears that the Seagull enters the hacienda.

125.title: Episode #1.125
125.plot: The meeting in Manzanillo begins but Aaron does not miss the opportunity to give Mariana a hard time, while Rodrigo calls Mariana to dedicate a serenade and get reconciled.

126.title: Episode #1.126
126.plot: Sofia no longer doubts that Francisco cheats on her with another woman, while Rodrigo is led to think that the Seagull spent the night with Alonso.

127.title: Episode #1.127
127.plot: Gaviota and Rodrigo meet again at the ranch and Gaviota can not help confessing that he is the great love of his life, but Aaron wants to put doubt telling Rodrigo that Gaviota has affairs with Alonso.

128.title: Episode #1.128
128.plot: Rodrigo holds a small party for Mariana for her birthday but happiness and good times are overshadowed by a call from Isadora and Sofia.

129.title: Episode #1.129
129.plot: Minerva demands that Aaron return as soon as possible since he does not doubt that he is cheating her, which causes Aaron to get tired of her, while Rodrigo and Alonso face a singing battle for Mariana.

130.title: Episode #1.130
130.plot: Sofia goes to Isadora's house to tell her that Rodrigo returned very badly and that she now needs psychological help, but without wanting to, Sofia finds Francisco's handkerchief and demands an explanation.

131.title: Episode #1.131
131.plot: Sofia finds Francisco talking to a woman on the phone and does not hesitate to ask her, while Mariana is more than determined that he CRT gives her a place abroad so he can not see Rodrigo anymore.

132.title: Episode #1.132
132.plot: Mariana is sad to know that Rodrigo has not looked for her but does not lose hope that he will do it, but Rodrigo wants to be able to forget her.

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Sofia talks with Isadora and confesses that she will not rest until she finds the woman with whom Francisco deceives her, which makes Isadora nervous. Rodrigo opens his heart and thoughts to his psychologist.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: James helps Sofía look for the woman with whom her husband cheats, which causes James to feel bad seeing her so desperate and hurt. However, Francisco to solve things tells him not to distrust him since he will always love her.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot: Daniela tells Mariana that Rodrigo is taking therapies with a psychologist because she feared going crazy before her separation with an Isadora and that she would take her trip earlier than planned, which makes Mariana sad.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Isadora and Minerva spend the night with some gentlemen whom they know in a restaurant, Hilario confesses to Mariana that he is deeply in love with Isadora and that he feels bad about having betrayed Rodrigo since he considered him a great friend.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot: Rodrigo talks with his psychologist that the love he feels for Gaviota is very strong and that he feels very bad about not seeing her in so long.

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot: Isadora has her first meeting in a bar with Eugenio, everything is going very well until he invites her to spend the night in his apartment, Isadora when she hears that she is annoyed and decides to leave.

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot: Sofia discovers that Isadora is Francisco's lover but he makes her doubt asking him if he does not think it's time for them to have a son, while Alonso will not stop conquering Mariana.

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Rodrigo goes on a trip for his tequila promotion, something that makes Mariana very sad, but at the same time he starts thinking about giving Alonso a chance because he does not want to suffer more for something that will never come.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: Alonso confesses his love to Mariana as well as finding out that Rodrigo is back in Mexico. Something that confuses Mariana because she does not know what to do.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Gaviota is very sad to learn that Rodrigo has not called or sought more, while Isadora requires Francisco to divorce as soon as possible from Sofia.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Sanjuana tells Hilario that she is pregnant with him but Hilario does not believe him and tells him to leave him in peace since he does not doubt that it is from someone else and he confesses that he wants to.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: Fedra advises Minerva and Isadora not to attend the tribute of Don Amador, while Rodrigo and Mariana do not stop thinking and both fear and have lost the love that united them so much.

145.title: Episode #1.145
145.plot: Mariana and Rodrigo meet again and can not help but look at each other and tell each other how much they have changed, but Minerva. Fedra and Isadora arrive at the least expected moment which complicates the situation.

146.title: Episode #1.146
146.plot: Mariana quarrels with Minerva and demands an explanation of why so many offenses towards her, while Francisco and Isadora want to leave the event but Sofia discovers them.

147.title: Episode #1.147
147.plot: The Montalvo family meets to read Amador's testament, but that's where Amador asks that Mrs. Clara be present, which makes Rodrigo and Doña Pilar think a lot of things.

148.title: Episode #1.148
148.plot: Mariana and Clarita appear before the Montalvo family to clarify the testament, but Doña Pilar asks Clara what kind of relationship she had with Amador so that they were indispensable in the reading.

149.title: Episode #1.149
149.plot: Clarita opens her heart and confesses that she was completely in love with Don Amador as well as telling Doña Pilar how they met and how much they appreciated each other.

150.title: Episode #1.150
150.plot: Isadora talks to her father and he tells her that he will not be able to pay the debts since the banks will not give him the loan, which infuriates Isa, while Daniela finds out that Isadora was already pregnant before the insemination.

151.title: Episode #1.151
151.plot: Daniela speaks with Rodrigo and tells him that Isadora's son is not his, what makes Rodrigo so furious that he hurts his sister.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: Isadora and Francisco believe that their plans to escape could result but things change when Sofía and Rodrigo find them in a restaurant in which a tremendous uproar is made.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: Rodrigo and Erika kiss in her apartment, but he repents and asks forgiveness for what happened.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: The "Gaviota" bombs Daniela with questions about the psychologist and realizes that she is losing Rodrigo and in a restaurant confronts him.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Aaron goes to the Gaviota office and threatens to sue her to take the hacienda from the "Mirasoles".

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: The lawyer Santoveña can no longer hide what he feels for Gaviota and on an impulse he kisses her, Rodrigo is about to discover them.

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot: Erika convinces La Gaviota to look for Rodrigo and recover their relationship. Seagull goes to look for him at the airport and they reconcile.

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot: The two lovebirds go on a trip to enjoy their great love.

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: James learns that the agave crops are sick and invaded by pests and the bank denies him the loan to move the hacienda forward.

160.title: Episode #1.160
160.plot: While Rodrigo and Seagull live their love, Aaron accuses them of fraud before the authorities and thus cover their guilt.

161.title: Episode #1.161
161.plot: Rodrigo learns that he and Gaviota were accused of the fraud committed by Aaron and decides to plead guilty to prevent her from being arrested.

162.title: Episode #1.162
162.plot: Rodrigo makes Gaviota believe that he does not love her enough for her to go to Europe and not run the risk of being arrested. Seagull goes disconsolate.

163.title: Episode #1.163
163.plot: While Rodrigo pleads guilty, the Seagull travels with his mother to Europe thinking that he does not love her.

164.title: Episode #1.164
164.plot: Pilar, Rodrigo's grandmother finds out that he is in jail, reunites his family to talk about his grandson and visits him in the prison.

165.title: Episode #1.165
165.plot: Gaviota and her mother are already in London while Rodrigo is in jail and makes Daniela swear not to say anything to the Seagull.

166.title: Episode #1.166
166.plot: Rodrigo has been in jail for a month now and the chances of him leaving are becoming less.

167.title: Episode #1.167
167.plot: LLuvia pleads guilty in the Public Ministry and is arrested, Patricio demands that Aaron take her out of jail.

168.title: Episode #1.168
168.plot: Pamela puts a trap on Aaron and makes Minerva find them in his semi-nude apartment. The lover of Aaron gives him the evidence to incriminate him to Minerva.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: Rodrigo declares against Aaron, because he can not stand that Lluvia is detained. Minerva delivers information that proves that Aaron is guilty of fraud.

170.title: Gran final
170.plot: Rodrigo goes in search of Seagull to London and finds her very excited with Dr. Santoveña. Everything is arranged upon hearing of Rodrigo's sacrifice gull.

imdb.title: Distilling Love
plot: Young girl falls in love with a wealthy man::May P
